answers.answer: Hi.  Sorry to hear your father is having these problems.Simply put, Diffuse Cerebral Atrophy means there is shrinkage in the brain.Multiple Lacunar Infarcts indicates multiple areas of a specific type of stroke. Bilateral Centrum Semiovale is the location in the brain of the stroke(s).From what I understand, these types of strokes can be caused due to a blockage. Hypertension, diabetes, high cholesterol and smoking are risk factors to have these types of strokes.It is possible for improvement.  Is he on any treatment now?
